level.heading: Application and construction of chapter.
level.text: This chapter shall be applied and construed to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the laws with respect to the subject of the chapter among states enacting it.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-113, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-201.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 6 of the Uniform Conservation Easement Act. See 12 Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
